lead_paragraph: The News Corporation and Time Warner Cable struck a deal just in time for the Sugar Bowl.
snippet: The News Corporation and Time Warner Cable said Friday evening that they had agreed on new terms for a contract covering Fox stations in New York, Los Angeles, Orlando and other markets.

headline.main: Time Warner and Fox Reach Deal for Cable Distribution

abstract: The News Corporation and Time Warner Cable said Friday evening that they had agreed on new terms for a contract covering Fox stations in New York, Los Angeles, Orlando and other markets.
